body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Bryan Russell and I represent Car Depot, your friendly neighborhood car dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janet. How can I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your contact number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five one two three four and my email address is janet.edwards@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janet. I've noted down your contact details. Can you also confirm your home address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is one two three Maple Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Janet. Your information is safe with us. Is there any specific concern or inquiry you have regarding our inventory today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm frustrated because I can't find the specific car model I'm looking for.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Janet. Let me check our inventory system to see if we can locate that car model for you. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Janet. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
